creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark in memory of Sheila Littlejohn
description: two corn stalks with heavy foliage in muted olive greens, shimmering white, and rust; two ears of corn visible near center
markings:

medium: Ink, color, and mica on silk
signed: LRC: 大正十三年八月 {Taishō jūsan-nen hachi gatsu} / 波留 {Haru}
title: Corn plant
